dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT ORDER_BASE_GID, "Loc", "Contract #", "Commodity", "Destination Port", TO_CHAR("MT Weight", '999,999,990.999') "MT Weight", TO_CHAR("MT Applied", '999,999,990.999') "MT Applied", TO_CHAR("# Boxes", '999,999,990') "# Boxes", "Customer", "Begin Sail", "End Sail", "CAK Status" FROM VIEW_BOOK_APPLIED_CAKS WHERE "Loc" IN (SELECT TO_NUMBER(xt.column_value) FROM XMLTABLE (LTRIM(RTRIM(REGEXP_REPLACE (REGEXP_REPLACE(:LOC,'[^[:digit:]]+', ','),'^,+|,+$'), ','), ',')) xt) AND "CAK Status" = :CAK_Status AND :P_RUN = 'FINAL' UNION SELECT NVL(ORDER_BASE_GID, 'Data Missing in System') ORDER_BASE_GID, NVL("Loc", 'Data Missing in System') "Loc", NVL("Contract #", 'Data Missing in System') "Contract #", NVL("Commodity", 'Data Missing in System') "Commodity", NVL("Destination Port", 'Data Missing in System') "Destination Port", NVL(TO_CHAR("MT Weight", '999,999,990.999'), 'Data Missing in System') "MT Weight", NVL(TO_CHAR("MT Applied", '999,999,990.999'), 'Data Missing in System') "MT Applied", NVL(TO_CHAR("# Boxes", '999,999,990'), 'Data Missing in System') "# Boxes", NVL("Customer", 'Data Missing in System') "Customer", NVL("Begin Sail", 'Data Missing in System') "Begin Sail", NVL("End Sail", 'Data Missing in System') "End Sail", NVL("CAK Status", 'Data Missing in System') "CAK Status" FROM VIEW_BOOK_APPLIED_CAKS WHERE "Loc" IN (SELECT TO_NUMBER(xt.column_value) FROM XMLTABLE (LTRIM(RTRIM(REGEXP_REPLACE (REGEXP_REPLACE(:LOC,'[^[:digit:]]+', ','),'^,+|,+$'), ','), ',')) xt) AND "CAK Status" = :CAK_Status AND :P_RUN = 'DRAFT'

SELECT ORDER_BASE_GID, "Booking #", "Shipment #", "Inland Date", TO_CHAR("Est MT Weight", '999,999,990.999') "Est MT Weight", TO_CHAR("Est # Boxes", '999,999,990') "Est # Boxes", TO_CHAR("Applied MT", '999,999,990.999') "Applied MT", TO_CHAR("Applied # Boxes", '999,999,990') "Applied # Boxes", "Ship Date", "Arrival Date", "Booking Status" FROM VIEW_BKS_APPLIED_CAKS_BOOKINGS WHERE :P_RUN = 'FINAL' UNION SELECT NVL(ORDER_BASE_GID, 'Data Missing in System') ORDER_BASE_GID, NVL("Booking #", 'Data Missing in System') "Booking #", NVL("Shipment #", 'Data Missing in System') "Shipment #", NVL("Inland Date", 'Data Missing in System') "Inland Date", NVL(TO_CHAR("Est MT Weight", '999,999,990.999'), 'Data Missing in System') "Est MT Weight", NVL(TO_CHAR("Est # Boxes", '999,999,990'), 'Data Missing in System') "Est # Boxes", NVL(TO_CHAR("Applied MT", '999,999,990.999'), 'Data Missing in System') "Applied MT", NVL(TO_CHAR("Applied # Boxes", '999,999,990'), 'Data Missing in System') "Applied # Boxes", NVL("Ship Date", 'Data Missing in System') "Ship Date", NVL("Arrival Date", 'Data Missing in System') "Arrival Date", NVL("Booking Status", 'Data Missing in System') "Booking Status" FROM VIEW_BKS_APPLIED_CAKS_BOOKINGS WHERE :P_RUN = 'DRAFT'

SELECT ORDER_BASE_GID, TO_CHAR("CAK MT", '999,999,990') "CAK MT", TO_CHAR("Booking MT", '999,999,990') "Booking MT", TO_CHAR("MT Remaining", '999,999,990') "MT Remaining", "%" FROM VIEW_BOOK_APPLIED_CAKS_SUMMARY WHERE :P_RUN = 'FINAL' UNION SELECT ORDER_BASE_GID, NVL(TO_CHAR("CAK MT", '999,999,990'), 'Data Missing in System') "CAK MT", NVL(TO_CHAR("Booking MT", '999,999,990'), 'Data Missing in System') "Booking MT", NVL(TO_CHAR("MT Remaining", '999,999,990'), 'Data Missing in System') "MT Remaining", "%" FROM VIEW_BOOK_APPLIED_CAKS_SUMMARY WHERE :P_RUN = 'DRAFT'

SELECT order_base_gid, "Note", TO_CHAR("Note Order", '999999990') "Note Order" FROM VIEW_CONTRACT_NOTES WHERE :P_RUN = 'FINAL' UNION SELECT order_base_gid, NVL("Note", 'Data Missing in System') "Note", NVL(TO_CHAR("Note Order", '999999990'), 'Data Missing in System') "Note Order" FROM VIEW_CONTRACT_NOTES WHERE :P_RUN = 'DRAFT'
